column2: ENGLISH
AI_EVENT
I will not be blackmailed

Your shameful attempt at blackmail has not succeeded. No matter how many corrupted souls you have enticed to help carry out your plan I will not give in without a fight. I'd rather die defending what is rightfully mine!

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
Then it is war!
I guess I have no choice...
On second thought...
Shed a tear for gallant Sir [From.GetFirstName].
Isn't [From.GetSheHe] adorable?
It seems my dalliance with [From.Mother.GetTitledFirstName] has resulted in a child. Fortunately, [From.Father.GetTitledFirstName] thinks little [From.GetFirstName] is his!
I don't mind.
Avoid [Root.Liege.GetHerHim]
[From.GetSheHeCap]'s not my type
What took [From.GetHerHim] so long?
Dissuade [From.GetHerHim].
Kick [From.GetHerHim] out and tell everyone what happened!
I went to [From.GetFirstName]'s chamber and gave [From.GetHerHim] a good tumble!
[From.GetFirstName] has spurned my subtle advances.
How could [From.GetSheHe] resist my charms?
[From.GetFirstName] was furious and made a public spectacle of the incident!
Oops. How embarrassing!
Peasant rebels have taken control of one of our holdings in [From.GetName] and declared independence!
My time spent secretly preaching in [Root.Location.GetName] has paid off: most of the peasants have embraced the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith!
It took all my skill and charm to sow distrust between the local ruler and his vassals, but at last their relations lay in ruins.
Undermine Faction Member
I have discovered an opportunity for [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] to undermine [faction_member.GetTitledName]'s standing with the rest of the Court Faction.
I have discovered an opportunity for [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] to undermine [faction_member.GetTitledName]'s standing with the rest of the Prosperity Faction.
I have discovered an opportunity for [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] to undermine [faction_member.GetTitledName]'s standing with the rest of the Glory Faction.
I have discovered an opportunity for [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] to undermine [faction_member.GetTitledName]'s standing with the rest of the Tradition Faction.
Report it to [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]
Ignore it
Spy Network Increased

Your efforts to increase your network of contacts throughout [Root.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has met with measured success. [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] will be pleased, though this has the added side-benefit of increasing your own personal network at the same time.
Spy Network Suffers Setback

Try as you might, your efforts to expand the network of spies throughout [Root.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has met with nothing but problems, as of late. One of your most important contacts in [Root.Liege.Capital.GetName] just turned up dead, and two others are missing. This will require you to redouble your efforts.

You have been sent into [Root.Location.GetName] by [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] to calm the peasantry when your patrol happens across a group of angry rabble. They seem hesitant to engage with a group of armed soldiers on horseback, but perhaps this is a good opportunity to teach them a lesson?
They shall be an example to their fellows
They are but commoners -- let them be
Praise the man for a fantastic feast!
I don't really need to bloat his ego more.
Not much left to do but enjoy it.
Upholding the virtue of Charity means to bear wrongs patiently. There are some people who dislike me personally and wish me bad luck, but I forgive them.
Things are quiet in [Root.Location.GetName] at the moment, and you have taken advantage of the calm to rest and recover some of the strength sapped by your previous illness.
Good health is a blessing
Has [From.GetSheHe] gone insane?
Never! It will be war!

To the Noble [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
I am concerned that you have not yet heeded my call to arms against the infidels. I hope that this is a mere oversight on your behalf. and expect that you will rally to the cause of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] soon.

[From.GetTitledName]
Your crusade does not concern me
I am shocked to see that my liege, [Root.Liege.GetTitledName], has not yet answered the [Root.RelHead.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]'s call for a [Root.Religion.GetCrusadeName].

My liege,
I am concerned that you have not yet heeded the [From.RelHead.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]'s call to arms for the [From.Religion.GetCrusadeName]. I pray that you plan to rally the armies of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] for this holy cause in the near future.

Your loyal subject, 
[From.GetTitledName]

The [Root.RelHead.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle] has finally called for a [Root.Religion.GetCrusadeName] and many of us are eager to fight. But my liege, [Root.Liege.GetTitledName], has not yet rallied the armies of [Root.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetName].

My liege,
Many of us are eager to join the [From.RelHead.GetCrusadeName] and fight for the glory of [From.Religion.GetHighGodName]. So it is with concern I notice that you have yet to answer the [From.RelHead.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]'s call to arms. I assume that you plan to rally the armies of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] in the near future.

Your loyal subject, 
[From.GetTitledName]
§Y[Root.job_spymaster.GetBestName]§! has successfully §Gincreased§! your Personal Spy Network by §Y10§!.

My liege,
Try as I might, my efforts to expand your spy network within [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has encountered nothing but problems as of late. I hope you trust that this is merely bad luck, and that it will pass, for I intend to redouble my efforts immediately to overcome this setback.

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]

Sadly, [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]'s informants were good enough to tip [From.GetHerHim] off regarding your plans. Not only did the attempt do nothing, [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] is aware of your involvement and is reportedly furious.

Sadly, [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]'s informants were good enough to tip [From.GetHerHim] off regarding your plans. Still, that didn't happen quickly enough to prevent you from doing some damage -- though, admittedly, it was not very much. [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] is aware of your involvement and is reportedly furious.

[From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]'s informants made him aware of your attack, as well as your personal involvement, but not before [From.GetHerHis] network was dealt a serious blow. [From.GetSheHe] is reportedly furious.

[From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]'s informants made him aware of your attack, as well as your personal involvement, but not before [From.GetHerHis] network was dealt a significant blow. Indeed, you're quite sure the damage to [From.GetHerHis] network was greater than the effort it cost you. [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] is reportedly furious.
All that trouble for nothing!
Well, at least I did some damage

It's quite laughable. [FromFrom.GetTitledName] made an attempt to ferret out your various spies and informants, but [FromFrom.GetHerHis] attempt was so bungling all it did was reveal [FromFrom.GetHerHim] to you. Clearly [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] is planning on making a move against you.

[FromFrom.GetTitledName] recently made a move to ferret out your various spies and informants. Your own network discovered [FromFrom.GetHerHis] plan quickly enough, but not before [FromFrom.GetSheHe] was able to do a bit of damage. Still, you know exactly who was behind it.

[FromFrom.GetTitledName] recently made a move to ferret out your various spies and informants. Your own network discovered [FromFrom.GetHerHis] plan quickly enough, but not before [FromFrom.GetSheHe] was able to do a fair amount of damage. Still, you know exactly who was behind it.

Bad news! Many of your informants and spies have gone missing as of late, enough to cause you a great deal of alarm. Someone is clearly targeting your spy network, and only belatedly did you discover who: [FromFrom.GetTitledName]. Clearly the [FromFrom.GetManWoman] has [FromFrom.GetHerHis] sights upon you.
[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] won't get away with this!

The attempt to dismantle [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]'s network of informants didn't go well, sadly. [FromFrom.GetHerHisCap] informants were good enough to tip [FromFrom.GetHerHim] off, but fortunately not good enough to reveal your part in the attempt.

[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]'s network of informants took some damage at your hands, though the men and woman you captured were of relatively minor important. At least [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] wasn't able to discover your part in the attack.

[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]'s network of informants took a great deal of damage at your hands. [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] is still reeling, [FromFrom.GetHerHis] men on high alert now, and evidently has no idea of your involvement. A successful attack, to be sure.

Your agents found some critical informants within [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]'s network and eliminated them before [FromFrom.GetSheHe] was able to react. [FromFrom.GetHerHisCap] men are on high alert, now, but they obviously had no inkling of your involvement. A job well done.
At least [FromFrom.GetSheHe] is clueless...
That will have to do, I suppose

Someone recently made an attempt to ferret out your network of informants. You discovered it before any damage was done, but you have no idea who was behind it all. For now, your men are on high alert.

A number of your informants have recently gone missing, though no-one of critical importance. Thankfully, you got wind of the attack on your network before more damage could be done. Still, it would be nice to know who was behind it.

A number of your informants in [Root.Capital.GetName] have recently gone missing, simply vanished without a trace. It's clear that someone has been attacking your network, but, whoever they are, they're skilled enough to keep themselves hidden from your spies.

Some of your critical informants in [Root.Capital.GetName] went missing recently. Their loss is a serious blow to your network of spies, and, far worse, you have no idea who was behind the attack. Your men are on high alert, but clearly someone is targeting you.

In short order, your soldiers have the rabble dispersed. Several have been killed and others captured, desperately screaming for mercy. Tales of the brutal assault spread throughout [Root.Location.GetName], and the effect is what you hoped -- fear of your blade and the anger of [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal].

The rabble disperses after a quick melee, but not before you receive a knife in your ribs for the trouble. Regardless, several have been killed and others captured. Tales of the brutal assault spread throughout [Root.Location.GetName], and the effect is what you hoped -- fear of your blade and the anger of [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal].

My liege,
I am pleased to report that, after soundly defeating a group of rabble in [From.Location.GetName], the local peasantry are cowed and should be less trouble in the years to come.

Your loyal servant,
[From.GetBestName]

My liege,
I recently engaged in a heated battle with rabble in [From.Location.GetName]. Although wounded, I saw them defeated and tales of my victory have spread throughout the province. The peasantry should be less trouble in the years to come.

Your loyal servant,
[From.GetBestName]

My [Root.GetLordLady],
I was sent to [From.Location.GetName] to deal with the rebellious rabble, and after a recent engagement I am glad to report my success. They should trouble you far less in the years to come.

Sincerely,
[From.GetBestName]

It turned out the rabble was far better-armed than we suspected. Not only that, more streamed out of nearby homes. Several of my men were killed and I was forced to flee. Sadly, tales of this 'victory' have emboldened angry peasants throughout the province.

It turned out the rabble was far better-armed than we suspected. Not only that, more streamed out of nearby homes. Several of my men were killed and I barely escaped with my life after being stabbed. Sadly, tales of this 'victory' have emboldened angry peasants throughout the province.

My liege,
I fear I have troubling news to report. I was recently beset-upon by angry rabble in [From.Location.GetName], and although I escaped with my life the tales of this 'victory' have emboldened their fellows throughout the province. I apologize for the trouble this shall surely cause.

Your loyal servant,
[From.GetBestName]

My liege,
I fear I have troubling news to report. I was recently beset-upon by angry rabble in [From.Location.GetName], and barely escaped with my life after being stabbed. Sadly, tales of this 'victory' have spread and emboldened their fellows throughout the province. I apologize for the trouble this shall surely cause.

Your loyal servant,
[From.GetBestName]

My [Root.GetLordLady],
I fear I have troubling news. I was recently sent to [From.Location.GetName] on [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]'s business and there I was beset-upon by angry rabble -- barely escaping with my life. Sadly, tales of this 'victory' have spread and emboldened their fellows throughout the province. I apologize for the trouble this shall surely cause.

Sincerely,
[From.GetBestName]

Your righteous struggle against [From.Religion.GetHighGodName]'s enemies has not gone unnoticed. I have dispatched a [From.PrimaryTitle.GetAdjective] emissary with what I hope are sufficient funds to assist you.
Ask for help
The [This.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle] will read my desperate plea...
This cannot be abided!

We have caught [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] attempting to smuggle out a letter to the [rightful_rel_head.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle], where [From.GetSheHe] asks for intervention on [From.GetHerHis] behalf.
Slit [From.GetHerHis] throat!
I can't keep a [From.GetManWoman] of [From.Religion.GetHighGodName] imprisoned.
[From.GetSheHeCap] will remain where [From.GetSheHe] is

A letter has arrived from the [rightful_rel_head.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]. [rightful_rel_head.GetSheHeCap] demands we release [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] from our prison and submit to the will of [From.Religion.GetHighGodName].
In [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]'s name, let it be done
I am the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle], not [rightful_rel_head.GetHerHim]!

An emissary from [From.GetTitledFirstName] has arrived in our court. According to the emissary, the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle] is concerned about our employment of heathens as advisors, and has asked me to remove them from their position.
The [From.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle] has agreed to lift the excommunication against me!
The [From.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle] has refused to lift the excommunication against me.
Ill news...
I am most concerned that you allow heretics as your advisors. They should immediately be removed from their position.
Pagan Lord Converted
Pagan Courtier Converted
Rival Missionary
I want to hear 'Steppenwolf'!
This year's summer fair was a great success! The merchants and traders drawn to [Root.Capital.GetName] have revitalized the province's economy.
Perhaps it is a miracle - my old injury is beginning to feel a little better.
My wound has become infected and gangrenous. The surgeon says that the limb must be removed if I am to survive.
Argh, the pain!
The illness sent me into a deep sleep in which I spent days moaning and trashing about in my fevered delirium. When I woke, the fever had broken but the world had gone dark.
I cannot see!
Reveal the truth to all that will listen.

Someone has been spreading lies about me to my vassals, saying that I distrust them and am unfit to rule. Unforunately it seems my vassals are receptive to this slander, and my relations with them have been damaged.
Who could have done this?

My liege, I have managed to sow distrust between [From.GetTitledName] and [From.GetHerHis] vassals. I hope this pleases you.

Your humble [Root.GetChancellorName],
[Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledName]
It seems that the [Root.GetChancellorName] of [From.Host.PrimaryTitle.GetName], [From.GetTitledName], has been hard at work in [From.Location.GetName] trying to spread unrest among my vassals.
It is of no concern

My lord, your [Root.GetChancellorName] [FromFrom.GetTitledName] tried to encourage my vassals to turn against me! This shameless act can not go unpunished and to stop further interference I have thus decided to imprison your [Root.GetChancellorName] for an indefinite period of time.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
Absolutely not!
New Friend
Perfect Activity
Friends forever!
Let's try again!
Failed Activity
Too bad!
Let's try again!
I can accept this

[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] is so furious over my treatment of [FromFrom.GetHerHim] that [FromFrom.GetSubjectPronoun] has left the realm for the court of [From.GetTitledName], letting it be known that [FromFrom.GetSubjectPronoun] is hiring troops to take what is 'rightfully' [FromFrom.GetPossPronoun] by force of arms!
The moneylenders are here, reminding me of that loan I took...
I have the money right here
I do not have the full amount, but I will pay the interest
I need more time to raise funds
You shall not have a single coin from me!
Take a five-year loan at 25% interest
The loan will be extended for two years
The debt will be due in five years
I'm sure [From.GetSheHe] won't go too far.
The [Root.Religion.GetName] faith has spread into the province of [Root.GetName]!
The [From.Religion.GetName] faith has spread into the province of [From.GetName]!

[From.GetTitledFirstName], a [From.Religion.GetName] preacher in the service of [From.Liege.GetBestName], has arrived in [From.Location.GetName] to spread the gospel of their foreign religion. [From.GetSheHeCap] has little regard for our old faith, declaring it sinful, and has explained in detail the horrors we shall suffer in the afterlife unless we mend our ways.
We do not tolerate [From.GetHerHis] kind here
I wish to know more of this '[From.Religion.GetHighGodName]'
Send [From.GetHerHim] back to [From.GetHerHis] [From.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]
Will receive claim on random border province.\n
Enough of this -- banish the preacher!

My liege,
I have arrived safely in [From.Location.GetName] and [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] has given me permission to remain and spread the true faith. May [From.Religion.GetHighGodName] grant me the strength to endure the heathen ways of these savages...

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

My liege,
I bring bad news. Although I seemed to be making progress in encouraging [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] to abandon [From.GetHerHis] heathen ways, [FromFrom.GetSheHe] had a sudden change of heart and now I have been banished from [FromFrom.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. I am willing to remain in secret, and preach to the people, though there is considerable risk if I am discovered.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

My liege,
I bring bad news. Although I seemed to be making progress in spreading the word of [From.Religion.GetHighGodName] in [FromFrom.PrimaryTitle.GetName], [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] took exception to my recent conversion of one of [FromFrom.GetHerHis] courtiers and banished me. I am willing to remain in secret and preach to the people of [From.Location.GetName], though there is considerable risk in doing so.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

My liege,
I bring bad news. Although I seemed to be making progress in spreading the word of [From.Religion.GetHighGodName] in [FromFrom.PrimaryTitle.GetName], [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] took exception to my recent conversion of one of [FromFrom.GetHerHis] courtiers and banished me. I am glad to be done with this place and will return as quickly as I can.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

My liege,
I arrived safely in [From.Location.GetName], but [From.Location.Owner.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] has refused to give me permission to remain in [From.Location.Owner.GetHerHis] court and demanded I return to [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. I cannot risk remaining, so I shall be back on the first available ship.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

My liege,
I arrived safely in [From.Location.GetName], but [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] has refused to give me permission to remain in [FromFrom.GetHerHis] court and demanded I return to [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. I am willing to remain and preach in secret, but that does involve risk if I should be discovered.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
Then remain and spread [From.Religion.GetHighGodName]'s word
It is not worth it for you to remain

[From.GetTitledName] has been gathering large crowds throughout [convert_province.GetName] to listen to [From.GetHerHis] words. Indeed, the number of converts to [From.GetHerHis] [From.Religion.GetName] faith is hard to believe. Many of your subjects are either alarmed or suggesting you should follow suit.

It seems [From.GetTitledName] did not return home when you ordered [From.GetHerHim] to. Indeed, [From.GetSheHe] has been traveling throughout [convert_province.GetName], preaching about [From.GetHerHis] [From.Religion.GetName] faith and earning many convertes. Your subjects are either enraged at the deception or suggesting it might be time for you to follow suit.
If my people believe, so must I
I have no interest in [From.GetHerHis] preaching
This has gone too far!
How dare [From.GetSheHe]!

My liege,
I have spread the word of [From.Religion.GetHighGodName] throughout [convert_province.GetName], earning many converts. Thankfully, [convert_province.Owner.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] appears unconcerned about my activities, and is pleased enough to allow me to remain at [convert_province.Owner.GetHerHis] court.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

Bad news. It seems [FromFrom.GetTitledName] has angered [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] by earning a great number of converts in [convert_province.GetName]. The [From.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle] ordered [FromFrom.GetHerHim] imprisoned, and now [FromFrom.GetSheHe] languishes in a [From.Culture.GetName] prison. Who knows what will happen to [FromFrom.GetHerHim] there?

It appears [From.GetTitledName] did not return to [From.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetName] when you ordered [From.GetHerHim] to. [From.GetSheHeCap] has been secretly preaching in [convert_province.GetName], and today was discovered and imprisoned by your soldiers.
How dare [From.GetSheHe]!

Bad news. It appears [From.GetTitledName] was discovered secretly preaching in [convert_province.GetName] by [convert_province.Owner.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]'s guards and now languishes in a [convert_province.Owner.Culture.GetName] prison.
Unfortunate
[Root.Liege.GetLordSpiritualName] Found and Captured
You are traveling through [convert_province.GetName] when you are suddenly beset upon by [convert_province.Owner.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]'s guards and captured!
My friends have come up with a daring plan to break me out of prison. Do I dare to make the attempt?
It's too risky
Freedom is worth any risk
Off with [From.GetPossPronoun] head!
I deserve my freedom. I should offer to pay a ransom for my release.
Make my request
My prisoner, [From.GetBestName], is offering to pay a ransom for [From.GetHerHis] freedom.
Accept the ransom
Let [From.GetHerHim] rot
I have become strongly attached to the culture of [Root.Capital.GetName], dressing and speaking almost like a local.
I feel like a [Root.Capital.Culture.GetName]
It is a passing fancy

For as long as we have ruled here, we have entrusted the raising of our children to Saxon nursemaids. Our first words would not be French but Saxon. As we grew up we learned to speak a tongue that was neither one nor the other. Now is this time to make this tongue our own so we may all communicate.

Around our lands more people are using this English language and I find this is a perfect means for a [Root.Culture.GetName] overlord to get his Saxon serfs to work properly. We continue to use our own influence to promote this means of communication in the interests of more efficient realm.
Your Tribal vassal, [From.GetTitledName], has adopted the Iqta system.
Your Tribal vassal, [From.GetTitledName], has founded a Merchant Republic.
Your Tribal vassal, [From.GetTitledName], has founded a Republic.
Your Tribal vassal, [From.GetTitledName], has founded a Theocracy.

My liege, the great Khagan has dispatched a numberless horde of barbarian horsemen against the lands of Central Asia and the Far East. Appearing in Balkh, the heathen armies seem intent on conquering the Muslim world, but could potentially range much further before their strength is spent!
[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] have mercy on us!
The Death of [Root.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]

The great [Root.GetTitledName], leader of the Mongol Empire, has died. According to his last wishes, he has split the mongol horde into three parts: one in the north to be led by [first_mongol_son.GetTitledName], one in the south to be led by [second_mongol_son.GetTitledName], and the remaining lands in Transoxania to be led by [third_mongol_son.GetTitledName]. All of the western world waits with bated breath to see if these brothers will begin a renewed siege upon their lands, or whether they will fall into infighting and civil war.

The great [Root.GetTitledName], leader of the Mongol Empire, has died. According to his last wishes, he has split the mongol horde into two parts: one in the north to be led by [first_mongol_son.GetTitledName], and one in the south to be led by [second_mongol_son.GetTitledName]. All of the western world waits with bated breath to see if these brothers will begin a renewed siege upon their lands, or whether they will fall into infighting and civil war.
This is how it shall be
A great leader has passed...
Hopefully this means a reprieve is at hand

With the passing of the Khagan, you are now given the option of serving one of the new leaders: [first_mongol_son.GetTitledFirstName] of the Golden Horde, [second_mongol_son.GetTitledFirstName] of the Ilkhanate, or [third_mongol_son.GetTitledFirstName] of the [third_mongol_son.PrimaryTitle.GetName] Horde.

With the passing of the Khagan, you are now given the option of serving one of the new leaders: [first_mongol_son.GetTitledFirstName] of the Golden Horde or [second_mongol_son.GetTitledFirstName] of the Ilkhanate.
I shall serve [first_mongol_son.GetTitledFirstName]
I shall serve [second_mongol_son.GetTitledFirstName]
I shall serve [third_mongol_son.GetTitledFirstName]

With the passing of your [GetFromFromRelation], you have been chosen to lead the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] and have been granted the lands and vassals accordingly. As per your [GetFromFromRelation]'s wishes, this means giving up your claims on the other lands...but it also means a chance to establish a dynasty in your own name, one that will take the legacy of your [GetFromFromRelation] and build upon it!
Long live the Khagan!
The [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] Converts
I am fine where I am

Now that you have established your empire, most of the men under your command have taken up positions within your court and returned to their homes, eager to reap the rewards of their time spent in your campaigns.
So must it be

We intend to settle this new land, and that means bringing as many of our people from across the Carpathian Mountains as we possibly can. We leave behind our old lands, it's true...but let the mongrels have it. Hungary is our domain, now, and it shall be an empire to inspire our ancestors!
Long live Hungary!

With [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]'s departure from our lands, all that is left are those of the [Root.Culture.GetName] people who did not care to move on. We will remain and forge a new destiny of our own!
That we shall
I have grown increasingly attached to [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName], and though our marriage was merely a practical arrangement I wonder if I have now come to love [Root.Spouse.GetHerHim].
This is a marriage of love
But all the other girls!
But all the other boys!
I am not ready to commit fully to [Root.Spouse.GetHerHim]
A Thieves' Guild has been established in [Root.GetName].
They have not stolen any of my property yet
Thanks to my tireless efforts, the Thieves' Guild in [Root.GetName] has been eradicated.
It is good to be the [Root.County.Holder.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]!
A Smugglers' Ring has formed in [Root.GetName].
I don't see how this matters to me?
Thanks to my tireless efforts, the Smugglers' Ring in [Root.GetName] has been destroyed. The head of the last smuggler is now rotting on a pike outside the city gates.
I am such a great [Root.County.Holder.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]
Bands of robbers are roaming the countryside in [Root.GetName], killing and stealing. They are too craven to attack my castles though.
I am safe inside my walls..
I have rounded up and executed the robber bands that were plaguing [Root.GetName]!
Call me [Root.County.Holder.GetTitledFirstName] the Great!
I will watch from the stands
I will not be attending
I will be taking my place among the fighters!
I look forward to watching from the stands.
I will fight in the tournament myself!
The war has forced an unfortunate end to the tournament. We shall have to begin again once victory is achieved.

Dear [Root.GetBestName],
I hereby invite you to the grand feast in [From.Location.GetName] that will be held in the honour of the Journey of Nerthus. Your presence at the holy feast would be greatly appreciated, and I look forward to your attendance.

[From.GetTitledFirstName]

The guests have finally arrived! All is ready: the cooks have worked day and night preparing the food for the holy feast, the priests have prepared the rites, and the castle has never looked lovelier. Nerthus would be pleased.

I made sure the most handsome man would be my dinner partner and during the feast I kept refilling both our wine glasses. My charm and my winning smile made it impossible for him to stay unresponsive, and it didn't take long until he looked at me with more than interest in his eyes...
The night of passion [From.GetTitledFirstName] and I shared was certainly exceptional. Come the next day, however, I must determine if there is, in fact, anything more between us...
Best not to annoy [Root.Liege.GetHerHim]
War disrupts our summer fair. We are forced to cancel our activities.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] believed me when I told [From.GetHerHim] I had never even talked to the girl who accused me of raping her.

Riders have been sent to all the corners of the land, spreading word that the grand Furusiyya tournament will soon be held. All knights are expected to attend, and all others will be invited to witness the spectacle.
Praise be to [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]!
The grand tournament known as the Furusiyya begins, and the coming two months shall separate those gifted with the skills of a warrior from those who would only pretend at such.

My [GetFromFromRelation], [FromFrom.GetBestName], has let me know that my sinful living shames the entire dynasty in [FromFrom.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. [FromFrom.GetSubjectPronounCap] is exerting [FromFrom.GetPossPronoun] influence to shield House [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName], but strongly urges me to seek guidance in the perfect example set by the Prophet (peace be upon him).

My decadent [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], refuses to change [From.GetPossPronoun] sinful ways. I can declare [From.GetObjectPronoun] a kafir, which will give me a reason to exile the degenerate... unless there is another way to get through to [From.GetObjectPronoun]?
I must join the [join_holy_order.GetFullName]!
Good, House [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] must stay pure!

I fear that the long years of peace have made me complacent and decadent. Where once I would long for the sounds of battle and the glory of victory, I now prefer the comfortable, easy life of luxury in my palaces.
Perhaps I should contemplate a new campaign?

The friend of a friend is my friend - a motto I try to live by and sometimes that is an easy truth. I was recently introduced to [friends_friend.GetTitledName] through my friend, [my_friend.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], and immediately felt a connection to [friends_friend.GetHerHim]...

I recently introduced [start_friend.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] to [friends_friend.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], and had high hopes. They are both my friends, after all, and I hoped they might hit it off and befriend each other, as well...
...alas, [start_friend.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] didn't care for [friends_friend.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] at all
...and, sure enough, they had a great time together!
...unfortunately, I don't think that's going to happen.
...but they didn't, sadly, and just ended up irritating each other

[start_friend.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] was introduced by a mutual friend, [my_friend.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], and we talked for quite a while. We had our differences and a few arguments, then we found common, safe ground and I began enjoying myself. [start_friend.GetSheHeCap] seems like a decent person.

After I talked to [start_friend.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] and discovered we had next to nothing in common, and that [start_friend.GetSheHe] was a horrible [start_friend.GetManWoman], I wanted nothing to do with [start_friend.GetHerHim] ever again! Our mutual friend, [my_friend.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], wasn't happy, but understood I wouldn't ever be friends with [start_friend.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal].
Sadly, [friends_friend.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] didn't feel the same way...

Though I had thought [From.GetTitledFirstName] to be a more reasonable man, [From.GetHerHis] request to be allowed to duel [From.GetHerHis] rival [duel_rival.GetTitledFirstName] was slightly... erratic. [From.GetTitledFirstName] claimed to be constantly subject to affronts from [duel_rival.GetTitledFirstName] and asked for permission to defend [From.GetHerHis] honor.
I'm a hunter
I'm a falconer
I'm a scholar
I'm a mystic
I'm an impaler
I'm a gardener
I'm a poet
I'm celibate
I'm a hedonist
I'm a duelist
I am proud to have become a faqih!
New Farming Techniques
With the help of the local aldermen, I have implemented new and improved farming techniques in [Root.Location.GetName].
My liege will be pleased!

My liege, I bring good news from the province of [From.Location.GetName]. In my research, I have come across new farming techniques which would increase the crop yield of the peasants' fields. With the help of the local aldermen, these techniques have now been implemented across the province.
Peasant Obstructionism
My efforts to improve the economy of [From.Location.GetName] have been hindered by peasant obstructionism. They are up in arms for what they believe to be a scheme to raise their taxes!
My liege won't be happy...

My liege, I regret that I must be the bearer of ill news. In my research, I have come across new farming techniques which would increase the crop yield of the peasants' fields. Despite the best of intentions, my attempts to implement these techiques have been met with suspicion and hostility from the local peasants, who are up in arms for what they believe to be a scheme to raise their taxes.
Foolish peasants!
The Jewish Community that I am sheltering has prospered and grown under my benevolent rule.
Excellent

My liege, I bring news from the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]. The Jewish merchants that you wisely allowed to settle in the city have grown fat and prosperous under your benevolent rule, and you can expect increased revenue from the taxes and tariffs imposed on their community.
Excellent
A skilled advisor from the Jewish Community I am sheltering has made his services available to me.

A group of Jewish refugees from distant lands have come to my court. They are seeking a new a place to live after being expelled from their former homes and ask for my permission to establish a community in one of my cities.
They are welcome!
Tell them to move on

[From.GetTitledName] has decreed that all Jews in [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] are to be expelled from the realm and their assets seized by the crown. This includes my own Jewish subjects, who I have no choice but to banish unless I want to openly defy my liege.
Bow to [From.GetHerHis] demands
Never!

You have been approached by a group of Hellenic priests who have offered you initiation into the Orphic Mysteries, a cult dedicated to the mythical poet, Orpheus, who descended into the Underworld to retrieve Persephone through his charm. Becoming a member would be a significant honor.
I will gladly join
I'm not interested

You have been approached by a group of Hellenic priests who have offered you initiation into the Sybilline Mysteries, a cult dedicated to the goddess Cybele—also known as the Great Mother—and her ancient oracle at Delphi. The cult is well known for its stewardship, and membership would be an honor.

You have been approached by a group of Hellenic priests who have offered you initiation into the Mysteries of Serapis, a cult dedicated to the Greco-Egyptian god that supplanted Osiris in renown and power. The cult is well known for its martial prowess, and membership would be an honor.

You have been approached by a group of Hellenic priests who have offered you initiation into the Mysteries of Despoina, the unnameable goddess and part of the eternal cycle of life and death. The cult is well known for its intrigues, and membership would be a great honor.

You have been approached by a group of Hellenic priests who have offered you initiation into the Mysteries of Trophonis, the ancient figure from whom the saying 'those whom the gods love die young' originates, and who has come to represent wisdom. The cult is renown for its scholars, and membership would be a great honor.
The Initiation

Three days later, you are blindfolded and brought down into a dark cavern, and there you take part in the ancient and secret rites of initiation with fellow members of the Mystery—those who are now your brothers and sisters.
The Mithraic Mysteries

You wake suddenly one evening, a bag thrown over your head, and struggle helplessly as you are dragged away. You awake in a dark cavern, surrounded by men in dark robes and a single priest standing below the statue of a great bull. They all hold wicked-looking knives.
This is an outrage!

The hooded priest below the bull statue addresses you. 'Know that you have been found worthy of the Mysteries of Mithras, that which is above all others. Accept and you will be initiated into the lowest rank, but can rise. Refuse...' The glint of flame on his blade indicates his deadly meaning.
Accept the great honor
Run for it!

Those who rank highest within the Mysteries gather in the mithraeum, hooded and unknowable. They listen intently as you describe the feats that you believe have earned your place among them. After a time, the high priest stands...
...and solemnly agrees to your request!
...and walks out without a word. Curses!

Far from their ancestral steppelands, the Bolghars have over the centuries slowly but steadily adopted more and more Slavic and Roman traditions. In the province of [Root.GetName], the people have now gone so far as to start considering themselves properly Bulgarian.
This war, this opportunity to prove my mettle in combat, has opened my eyes to my true potential as a warrior. My personal combat skills are improving...
My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetBestName], just earned XP from a combat impulse at the age of [From.GetAgeYears] with the CTA ambition [From.GetAmbition] (Martial: [From.GetMartial]).
My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetBestName], just earned XP from a combat impulse at the age of [From.GetAgeYears] (Martial: [From.GetMartial]).
My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetBestName], was victorious in a duel against [FromFrom.GetBestName] and earned XP (Ambition: [From.GetAmbition]).
My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetBestName], was victorious in a duel against [FromFrom.GetBestName] but did not earn any XP (Ambition: [From.GetAmbition]).
My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetBestName], leveled-up [From.GetHerHis] combat trait (Ambition: [From.GetAmbition]).

My combat victory against [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] was an insightful challenge to my own tactics. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] moved differently than I've come to expect and demonstrated a new, effective combat style to me. At no point was my victory certain, but I learned from [FromFrom.GetObjectPronoun] and finally defeated [FromFrom.GetObjectPronoun]. Certainly, I'm now a finer warrior.

I've learned many lessons from this battle. Aside from application of the theoretical tactics my mentors taught me as a [Root.GetLadLass], I've learned to deftly isolate an opponent in the thick of the front, bring all my focus and concentration to bear upon him, and then, within but a few rounds of melee, swiftly execute him. I'm proud of my clear progression into a greater warrior.
You asked [Root.Educator.GetTitledFirstName] to teach you how to fight better with a sword.
Under my guidance, my young [GetFromRelation], [From.GetFirstName], is slowly mastering the art of swordsmanship.
The sword in my hand seems heavier and heavier every year...

I will remember this battle in its finest detail until the end of my days. [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] guided my sword into the hearts of a countless number of my foes, raising cheers and battle-cries from my surrounding men as I cut a path through the enemy. My mastery of personal combat has come a long way. Apparently, I am not the only one to think so.
You and [combatant_1.GetBestName] recover from the furious fight, and are ready for another round. You scan [combatant_1.GetHerHim] to see if [combatant_1.GetSheHe] is getting tired yet.
You easily break through [round_loser.GetBestName]'s guard and knock [round_loser.GetHerHim] to the ground. [round_loser.GetSheHeCap] lies sprawled at your feet, completely at your mercy.

[round_winner.GetBestName] overwhelms your defense and, with a mighty blow, sends you sprawling to the ground. You look up at [round_winner.GetHerHim] towering above you, ready to deliver the finishing blow...
[round_winner.GetBestName] overwhelms your defense and, with a mighty blow, sends you sprawling to the ground. You look up at [round_winner.GetHerHim] towering above you...
[round_loser.GetBestName] drops [round_loser.GetHerHis] weapon and throws up [round_loser.GetHerHis] hands. 'Yield! I yield!'

[round_loser.GetBestName] drops [round_loser.GetHerHis] weapon and tries to flee, but you overhaul [round_loser.GetHerHim] easily! Exhausted, [round_loser.GetSheHe] drops to [round_loser.GetHerHis] knees and throws up [round_loser.GetHerHis] hands. 'Yield! I yield!'

Your blow leaves [round_loser.GetBestName] motionless on the ground, but as you approach you can still hear [round_loser.GetHerHis] ragged breaths: [round_loser.GetSheHe] lives, but may never wake again. You stand above [round_loser.GetHerHim] and...
[round_winner.GetFirstName] lowers the point of [round_winner.GetHerHis] weapon and extends a hand. 'I accept', [round_winner.GetSheHe] says, 'back on your feet.'
[round_winner.GetFirstName] looks down at you without a hint of emotion on [round_winner.GetHerHis] face.\n'No.'\nAll goes dark.
You and [combatant_1.GetBestName] are getting ready to cross arms yet another time. Surely [combatant_1.GetSheHe] must be nearly beaten now?
[round_winner.GetBestName] strikes, but you roll to dodge just in time, taking no more than a flesh wound. You force yourself back to your feet and hold your weapon ready.

You strike, but [round_loser.GetBestName] rolls to the side, wounded but still very much alive. [round_loser.GetSheHeCap] rises to [round_loser.GetHerHis] feet and readies [round_loser.GetHerHis] weapon once again.
Unable to withstand your attack, [round_loser.GetBestName] is beaten to the ground. You have battered [round_loser.GetHerHim], but [round_loser.GetBestName] stands back up, determined to fight on.
[round_loser.GetBestName] scrambles to [round_loser.GetHerHim] feet and runs away like the coward they are. The fight is over.
You and [combatant_2.GetBestName] recover from the furious fight, and are ready for another round. You scan [combatant_2.GetHerHim] to see if [combatant_2.GetSheHe] is getting tired yet.
You and [combatant_2.GetBestName] are getting ready to cross arms yet another time. Surely [combatant_2.GetSheHe] must be nearly beaten now?

In the midst of the battle you and [combatant_1.GetTitledFirstName] circle each other, tense and focused. The raging scene around you seems to slow down as you scan [combatant_1.GetHerHim] for any sign of weakness, any opening in [combatant_1.GetHerHis] defense that you could possibly exploit.

The court looks on tensely as you and [combatant_1.GetTitledFirstName] face each other in the duel. You scan [combatant_1.GetHerHim] for any sign of weakness, any opening in [combatant_1.GetHerHis] defense that you could possibly exploit.

You are not in the best condition to fight, and [combatant_1.GetTitledFirstName] is seemingly heartened by your illness. You bravely assume the position to meet [combatant_1.GetHerHim] regardless, ready to strike at any lapse in [combatant_1.GetHerHis] defense.

[combatant_1.GetTitledFirstName] is not in the best condition to fight, and so you take heart from [combatant_1.GetHerHis] illness. [combatant_1.GetSheHeCap] bravely assume the position to meet you regardless, and so you prepare to strike at any lapse in [combatant_1.GetHerHis] defense.

Your grievous injury is clearly hampering you as you assume the position to duel [combatant_1.GetTitledFirstName]. [combatant_1.GetSheHeCap] seems confident because of this, but you hold your ground regardless, ready to take advantage of any opening in [combatant_1.GetHerHis] defense that you could possibly exploit.

[combatant_1.GetTitledFirstName]'s grievous injury is clearly hampering [combatant_1.GetHerHim] as you assume the position to duel [combatant_1.GetHerHim]. You gain confidence because of this, but [combatant_1.GetSheHe] is holding [combatant_1.GetHerHis] ground regardless, ready to take advantage of any opening in your defense that [combatant_1.GetSheHe] could possibly exploit.

[combatant_1.GetTitledFirstName] faces you, and [combatant_1.GetSheHe] realises you are struggling with a wound. [combatant_1.GetSheHeCap] is looking at you searching for any sign of weakness, but you stand resolutely, ready to meet [combatant_1.GetHerHim].

As [combatant_1.GetTitledFirstName] faces you, you realise [combatant_1.GetSheHe] is struggling with a wound. You scan [combatant_1.GetHerHim] searching for any sign of weakness, but [combatant_1.GetSheHe] stand resolutely, ready to meet you.

Your weapon feels heavy in your young hands, your armour cumbersome. Yet you stand ready to face [combatant_1.GetTitledFirstName] in combat, slowly circling [combatant_1.GetHerHim] as you search for opportunity to strike.

[combatant_1.GetTitledFirstName] is clearly struggling with the weight of the weapon in [combatant_1.GetHerHis] young hands, [combatant_1.GetHerHis] armour labouring [combatant_1.GetHerHim] also. Yet [combatant_1.GetSheHe] stands ready to face you in combat, slowly circling you as you both search for opportunity to strike.

You and [combatant_1.GetTitledFirstName] slowly circle each other, tense and focused. You scan [combatant_1.GetHerHim] for any sign of weakness, any opening in [combatant_1.GetHerHis] defense that you could possibly exploit.

[round_loser.GetBestName] tries to fight back, but you force your way through, easily overpowering [round_loser.GetHerHis] pathetic defense. You strike for [round_loser.GetHerHis] heart with all your might!
You try to hold [round_winner.GetBestName] back, but [round_winner.GetHerHis] onslaught is unstoppable! You only slip once, but once is all [round_winner.GetSheHe] needs...
[round_loser.GetBestName] crumples to the ground, lifeless. You wipe [round_loser.GetHerHis] blood from your weapon. The deed is done. [round_loser.GetSheHeCap] is dead.

You and [combatant_2.GetTitledFirstName] slowly circle each other, tense and focused. You scan [combatant_2.GetHerHim] for any sign of weakness, any opening in [combatant_2.GetHerHis] defense that you could possibly exploit.
You and [combatant_1.GetBestName] sit atop your horses at opposite ends of the lists. Banners flap in the wind and the crowd looks on in rapt expectation. You brace yourself and ready your lance.
You and [combatant_2.GetBestName] sit atop your horses at opposite ends of the lists. Banners flap in the wind and the crowd looks on in rapt expectation. You brace yourself and ready your lance.

The crowd roars and hooves beat against the dirt. You lean into your charge, lance extended forward, sweat dripping from your brow. For a moment, the tension grips you completely. And then you feel the shock run down your arm, as your lances crashes into your opponent!

The crowd roars and hooves beat against the dirt. You lean into your charge, lance extended forward, sweat dripping from your brow. For a moment, the tension grips you completely. And then you feel the shock as your opponent's lance crashes into you!

The crowd roars and hooves beat against the dirt. You lean into your charge, lance extended forward, sweat dripping from your brow. For a moment, the tension grips you completely. And then you feel the slam of your opponent's lance into your shield, shattering it and wounding you!

The crowd roars and hooves beat against the dirt. You lean into your charge, lance extended forward, sweat dripping from your brow. For a moment, the tension grips you completely. And then you feel the shock run down your arm, as your lances shatters your opponent's shield and wounds him!

Your lance smashes into [round_loser.GetBestName]'s shield, and [round_loser.GetSheHe] topples from [round_loser.GetHerHis] horse. You slow your horse to a trot and turn, raising your lance into the sky while the crowd cheers your victory.

[round_winner.GetBestName]'s lance smashes into your shield, and you try to cling to your horse, but the force is too much. You are thrown from the saddle, and are left in the dirt as the crowd cheers for [round_winner.GetTitledFirstName]'s victory.

[round_loser.GetBestName] tries to take the blow on [round_loser.GetHerHis] shield, but your lance slips past, driving hard into [round_loser.GetHerHis] neck. The wood cracks and your opponent slips from [round_loser.GetHerHis] horse and lies in the dirt, slowly dying in a pool of [round_loser.GetHerHis] own blood. You have won, but at what cost?
You try to take the blow on your shield, but it slips past. You have just time enough time to fill with horror before the great wooden spear drives itself into your throat, and everything goes dark.

[round_winner.GetBestName]'s lance has wounded you, and you try to cling to your horse, but you can't hold on. You fall down into the dirt as the crowd cheers for [round_winner.GetTitledFirstName]'s victory.

In the midst of the battle you and [combatant_2.GetTitledFirstName] circle each other, tense and focused. The raging scene around you seems to slow down as you scan [combatant_2.GetHerHim] for any sign of weakness, any opening in [combatant_2.GetHerHis] defense that you could possibly exploit.

The court looks on tensely as you and [combatant_2.GetTitledFirstName] face each other in the duel. You scan [combatant_2.GetHerHim] for any sign of weakness, any opening in [combatant_2.GetHerHis] defense that you could possibly exploit.

You are not in the best condition to fight, and [combatant_2.GetTitledFirstName] is seemingly heartened by your illness. You bravely assume the position to meet [combatant_2.GetHerHim] regardless, ready to strike at any lapse in [combatant_2.GetHerHis] defense.

Your grievous injury is clearly hampering you as you assume the position to duel [combatant_2.GetTitledFirstName]. [combatant_2.GetSheHeCap] seems confident because of this, but you hold your ground regardless, ready to take advantage of any opening in [combatant_2.GetHerHis] defense that you could possibly exploit.

You gain confidence because of this, but [combatant_2.GetSheHe] is holding [combatant_2.GetHerHis] ground regardless, ready to take advantage of any opening in your defense that [combatant_2.GetSheHe] could possibly exploit.

[combatant_2.GetTitledFirstName] faces you, and [combatant_2.GetSheHe] realises you are struggling with a wound. [combatant_2.GetSheHeCap] is looking at you searching for any sign of weakness, but you stand resolutely, ready to meet [combatant_2.GetHerHim].

As [combatant_2.GetTitledFirstName] faces you, you realise [combatant_2.GetSheHe] is struggling with a wound. You scan [combatant_2.GetHerHim] searching for any sign of weakness, but [combatant_2.GetSheHe] stand resolutely, ready to meet you.

Your weapon feels heavy in your young hands, your armour cumbersome. Yet you stand ready to face [combatant_2.GetTitledFirstName] in combat, slowly circling [combatant_2.GetHerHim] as you search for opportunity to strike.

[combatant_2.GetTitledFirstName] is clearly struggling with the weight of the weapon in [combatant_2.GetHerHis] young hands, [combatant_2.GetHerHis] armour labouring [combatant_2.GetHerHim] also. Yet [combatant_2.GetSheHe] stands ready to face you in combat, slowly circling you as you both search for opportunity to strike.
You see a weak spot, a vulnerability in [round_loser.GetTitledFirstName]'s defense. It's not much, but it's all you need.
Fighting across the field, you see an enemy soldier cut off from the others. While you can't tell who, it's clear that they must be a highborn noble.

You were separated from your men in the chaos of battle, and now find yourself in the midst of war. As you scan the field and try to rejoin your forces, you see [From.GetBestName] break through the enemy ranks and charge you!
As you get closer, you realize the enemy soldier is [From.GetBestName].

As you get closer, you realize the enemy soldier is [From.GetBestName]. Seeing you charge across the field toward [From.GetHerHim], [From.GetSheHe] turns and flees. You pursue, but lose track of [From.GetHerHim] in the chaos.
You turn to face [From.GetTitle] [From.GetFirstName]... and [From.GetSheHe] breaks [From.GetHerHis] charge and flees. You pursue, but lose track of [From.GetHerHim] in the chaos.
You run away from [From.GetTitle] [From.GetFirstName] as hard as your legs will carry you. Seeing you run demoralises your troops, but at least you are still alive.
The last thing you see before everything goes black is the fuzzy shape of [From.GetTitledFirstName] turning and walking away, leaving you helpless in the dirt.
As [FromFrom.GetBestName] falls before you, [FromFrom.GetHerHis] soldiers look on and begin to lose hope.
[FromFrom.GetBestName] lies helpless at your feet, [FromFrom.GetHerHis] weapon discarded and yours at [FromFrom.GetHerHis] throat.
[FromFrom.GetBestName] lies helpless and senseless at your feet, [FromFrom.GetHerHis] eyes shut and body still, save only for the barest hint of breath.
You are defeated. [From.GetBestName] takes you prisoner.
[round_loser.GetTitledFirstName] comes at you honourably, but you use every dirty trick to try and take advantage. You attempt sly kicks and cunning trips, until you see an opportunity to strike.

You allow [round_loser.GetTitledFirstName] to take the initiative, patiently holding your ground while parrying [round_loser.GetHerHis] strikes. You wait until [round_loser.GetSheHe] seems tired, leaving a hole in [round_loser.GetHerHis] defense.

The duel proceeds in what seems like slow motion to you, your mind working adeptly to anticipate [round_loser.GetTitledFirstName]'s moves. After a deft parry, you spot an opportunity for yourself to strike.
Your experience in combat and prowess with your weapon allows you to spot an opening in [round_loser.GetTitledFirstName]'s defense. It's not much, but it's all you need.

[round_loser.GetTitledFirstName] is overwhelmed by your immense strength as you strike [round_loser.GetHerHim] with a body charge. [round_loser.GetSheHeCap] is sent reeling which gives you an opening.

You use great range with your sword to great effect, [round_loser.GetTitledFirstName] cannot get close enough to strike. Eventually you see a weak spot, and bring your weapon down from great height upon [round_loser.GetHerHim].

You launch a frenzied and furious attack on [round_loser.GetTitledFirstName], immediately setting [round_loser.GetHerHim] on the back foot. [round_loser.GetSheHeCap] appears panicked by this, allowing you an opening.
As you and [round_winner.GetTitledFirstName] engage, you slip up and leave an opening in your defense. [round_winner.GetTitledFirstName] strikes to try and take advantage.

You go at [round_winner.GetTitledFirstName] honourably, but [round_winner.GetSheHe] uses every dirty trick to try and take advantage. [round_winner.GetSheHeCap] attempts sly kicks and cunning trips, until [round_winner.GetSheHe] sees an opportunity to strike.

[round_winner.GetTitledFirstName] allows you to take the initiative, patiently holding [round_winner.GetHerHis] ground while parrying your strikes. You grow tired from this, leaving a hole in your defense. This is when [round_winner.GetSheHe] strikes.
[round_winner.GetTitledFirstName] seems to anticipate your every move, deftly parrying every strike. [round_winner.GetSheHeCap] then quickly sees an opening in your defense and proceeds to strike.
As you and [round_winner.GetTitledFirstName] engage, you slip up and leave an opening in your defense. A skilled warrior like [round_winner.GetTitledFirstName] needs no invitation to strike.

You are overwhelmed by [round_winner.GetTitledFirstName]'s immense strength as [round_winner.GetSheHe] strikes you with a body charge. You are sent reeling which gives [round_winner.GetHerHim] an opening.

[round_winner.GetTitledFirstName] uses [round_winner.GetHerHis] great range with [round_winner.GetHerHis] sword to good effect, you cannot get close enough to strike. Eventually [round_winner.GetSheHe] sees a weak spot, and brings [round_winner.GetHerHis] weapon down from great height upon you.
Before you have a chance to spot an opening, [round_winner.GetTitledFirstName] launches a furious, frenzied attack! You panic and are immediately set on the back foot.
The fight is over. [From.GetBestName] is defeated. You have won!
The joust is over. [From.GetBestName] is defeated. You have won!
Your duel has ended before it even could begin.
The duel is over. Neither you nor your opponent suffered lasting harm.
I challenged the cheater to a duel in front of all the tournament participants, the spectators and our host, [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]. No cheater will get away with it!
§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! begins advancement of [Root.GetHerHis] personal combat skills...\n
May [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] guide my heart, hand, and steel.
Hmm... now [From.GetSheHe]'s a poor fighter.
I'm recognized as a warrior in my own right now.
§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! continues advancement of [Root.GetHerHis] personal combat skills...\n
Still, I've more lessons to learn.
Stick 'em with the pointy end!
I'm finally a warrior.
If [combatant_1.GetSheHe] stumbles just once, this is over...
It's all over now!
Yield! Yield!
...but [round_winner.GetSheHe] doesn't move as everything goes dark.
I accept. Back on your feet..
Fetch a healer!
Your battle, fairly won.
Aaargh!
I will defeat [combatant_1.GetHerHim] soon...
You won't get another chance!
Why won't you just DIE?!
You should have yielded when you had the chance...
That's right, coward, run back to [From.Capital.GetName]!
If [combatant_2.GetSheHe] stumbles just once, this is over...
I will defeat [combatant_2.GetHerHim] soon...
My injury will not halt my strike...
[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] will guide me...
This flesh wound will not stop me...
I will aim for [combatant_1.GetHerHis] wound...
I cannot fail against this [combatant_1.GetLadLass]...
One mistake is all [combatant_1.GetSheHe]'ll get...
DIE!
Aaaaargh!
Requiescat in pace.
One mistake is all [combatant_2.GetSheHe]'ll get...
Charge!
Charge!
Raaagh!
Aaargh!
Yield! Yield!
Hah! Let's see you recover from THAT!
Victory!
Curses!
Such a tragedy...
Aaaaargh!
Curses!
I will aim for [combatant_2.GetHerHis] wound...
I cannot fail against this [combatant_2.GetLadLass]...
Strike!
Charge!
Prepare to die, [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] scum!
Prepare to die, [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] scum!
That's right, coward, run back to [From.Capital.GetName]!
That's right, coward, run back to [From.Capital.GetName]!
Better to live to fight again another day.
Now's our chance!
Come with me, and walk fast. It's a long way to [Root.Capital.GetName].
It's a long way to [Root.Capital.GetName].
I'll remember this, [From.GetOnlyDynastyName].
Defend yourself!
Victory is mine!
Let bygones be bygones
Hopefully our liege won't be angry...
I'll get you next time, [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] scum!
I defeated the cheater and thus proved their dishonesty!
I proved their guilt when my rival lay unconscious on the ground by my feet
Now [From.GetSheHe]'s a trained fighter.
I'm now recognized as a trained fighter.
I'm now recognized as a trained fighter.
I'm not finished yet!
No mercy for the vanquished.
Better dead than living like that!
Better part of valor! Better part of valor!
I'll drive my lance right through [FromFrom.GetHerHis] throat...
I'll drive my lance right through [From.GetHerHis] throat...
I need to get out of here!
I need to get out of here!
Now [From.GetSheHe]'s a skilled fighter.
I'm now renowned as a skilled fighter.
I'm now renowned as a skilled fighter.
Leave [round_loser.GetHerHim], [round_loser.GetSheHe] isn't worth the effort.
Now [From.GetSheHe]'s a formidable fighter!
I now command the respect of an elite warrior.
I now command the respect of an elite warrior.
My Daughter is my Heir

Since I still don't have a male heir, I may need to consider the possibility of my realm passing to my daughter. Rulership is harder for a woman, but not impossible. If I were to start raising her as my heir now, she would be better prepared should she succeed me to the throne...
I will raise a ruler to be proud of!
I might still have a son.
This will never happen. Stop asking me about it.
I am told my [From.GetFatherMother] does not wish me to be [From.GetHerHis] heir, and will put me aside as soon as [From.GetSheHe] has a son. It doesn't seem fair!
I must earn my right to rule.
But I deserve to rule!
I must bow to [From.GetHerHis] wishes.
My daughter is no longer under my tutelage to become the next ruler. What now?
I have a son now. That's all that matters.
I have another daughter who can take her place.
There is nothing to be done.
As the last hope for the continuation of his bloodline, it appears I am to be acknowledged by my father at long last.
It's about time!
My council advises me that my best hope for an heir is to acknowledge one of my bastards.
Very well.
Never!

While some might consider it inappropriate for a [Root.Religion.GetName] woman to bear arms, my knowledge of martial affairs and training with the blade have made me the equal of any man. I must now consider whether this is a path I intend to pursue in the years to come, or whether I will put aside such things for good.
This is my path.
I will be a proper [Root.Religion.GetName] woman.

I have been taught to fight with the blade and to lead men into battle. This is an honorable pursuit for a [Root.Religion.GetName] woman, and I can devote myself to such a path knowing [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] smiles upon me. Some say, however, that the role of a wife and mother should be my focus instead.
I shall be a wife and mother, no more.

It has come to your attention that [From.Liege.GetTitledName] is training [From.GetTitledFirstName] in the art of combat. This is highly inappropriate for a young woman of [From.Religion.GetName] faith—perhaps she needs a new tutor?
Offer the [From.Liege.GetTitle] my services

[From.GetTitledName] has offered [From.GetHerHis] services in tutoring [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName], suggesting it is inappropriate for a [FromFrom.Religion.GetName] girl to spend her time training with swords.
Perhaps this is for the best
[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] will be raised how I see fit

My dear [This.GetTitle], your offer is deeply appreciated. I am afraid [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] will continue to be tutored by her current guardian until I see fit to do otherwise.\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]
A foolish decision.
Age and poor health are wearing on me. If I am honest, it is time I realize I cannot serve as my liege's champion any longer.
I must inform [Root.Liege.GetHerHim] of the bad news.
I have received a letter from [From.GetBestName], informing me that he is no longer able to serve as my champion. Age and ill health, it seems, have gotten the best of him.
Sad news indeed.
I believe I would be a better champion for my lady liege than the man she currently favors with the title. Perhaps I should ask it of her?
The honor should be mine.
I'm not interested in being champion.
A letter has arrived from [From.GetBestName], saying that he is ready and eager—and more than qualified—to be my new champion.
I accept [From.GetHerHis] gracious offer.
I would rather keep my current champion.
No, and do not ask me again.
I want no further petitions of this kind.

My liege and lady, [From.GetTitledFirstName], is evidently not entirely happy with my performance as her champion. I hear that she has considered a petition from another who claims to be a better warrior than I, and thus better able to defend her honor. So far, however, I have heard nothing on the matter.
I must try harder to be worthy.
If she chooses to replace me, then so be it.
The day of the hunt has come! This is a wonderful chance for the court to venture to the countryside, indulge in fine weather, and allow the men to engage in their bloody sport.
What fun!
We've had such a delightful time together, chasing after the men on their horses, marveling as they try their best to impress both of us. I think I may have found a new friend!
I value this new friendship.
It won't outlast the hunt.
She has been such an irritant on this hunting trip, with not a single good word to say and always taking up the attention of the hunters. Does she not know who I am?
How dare she ruin my hunt!
I will grit my teeth and hold my tongue.
A great tournament, the like of which is not seen every year, has been announced in our realm! You are invited to watch it.
Of course, I MUST be there!
My faithful champion will represent me
Watch? I will show them my mettle!
No, I will not attend
As [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s champion, you are expected to defend her colours in the great tournament.
I will bring my lady the prize!
Your champion, [From.GetTitledFirstName], died of wounds sustained during the tournament.
Your champion, [From.GetTitledFirstName], has been crippled in the tournament.
Your champion, [From.GetTitledFirstName], has been injured in the tournament.
Your very own champion, [From.GetTitledFirstName], has won the grand tournament!
Celebrate with a large feast
A discrete celebration will suffice
Your very own champion, [From.GetTitledFirstName], has taken second place at the tournament!
Your very own champion, [From.GetTitledFirstName], has taken third place at the tournament!
All the men are looking at me and all the other ladies are jealous of me! I feel justified in my pride.
Mirror mirror on the wall, who's the fairest of them all?
I'm receiving a lot of attention, but I won't let it get to me. We all have our virtues and our vices.
I am humble.
This tournament is wonderful, there are so many people to talk to! I've met so many new friends already...
There are so many strange people here, I don't feel at ease around them. Just now, a woman I have never seen before tried to strike up a conversation...
But, my lady, we haven't even been introduced!
Not everyone here seems to appreciate my honesty.
But I'm only telling the truth!
The ladies here are so easy to fool. I could tell them that in Cathay the sky is green, and they would believe me.
The poor gullible fools!
Some of the knights here are really dreamy. If one of them were to proposition me, I think I would swoon!
Youth must have some dalliance
Some of the ladies here let their heads be turned by a pretty face and a dashing joust, but not I.
My honour is safe.
I may have been admitted into the tournament, but I keep hearing jeering whispers behind me. It seems some of the men here think I'm unworthy of competing in their martial games.
I can't wait to get my revenge in the melée
Let them talk...

The lords and ladies assembled here have long argued over who is the fairest, but the tournament's champion has crowned me with a wreath of flowers, as the most noble, graceful, and beautiful lady present!

The lords and ladies assembled argued over who is the fairest, but in the end it was Lady [From.GetFirstName] who was crowned with a wreath of flowers as the queen of the tournament, declaring her the most noble, graceful, and beautiful lady present.
How dare they! I deserved the crown!
Of course SHE wins it. They would never pick me.
She deserves it.
There was much discussion at the tournament about which lady had the most grace, nobility, and beauty, but finally it was decided [From.GetTitledFirstName] was the fairest.
You've seen Sir [From.GetFirstName] joust and train for the tournament, and must admit he is quite an attractive fellow. Perhaps...
Give him a signal.
Nothing good could come of this.
I always seem to bump into [From.GetTitledFirstName] and [From.GetSheHe] holds my eye for just a little too long before looking away. As if [From.GetSheHe]'s expecting something...
I should speak to [From.GetHerHim].
Sir [From.GetFirstName] approached me when we are a little apart from the crowd. I think I've made a catch! I'll ask him to...
...joust with a token of my favour.
...accompany me to see the musicians and singers.
...show me how to hit a bullseye on the archery range.
...get out of my face.
I keep trying to attract [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s attention, and he keeps ignoring me.
Sigh. So much for that.
Lady [From.GetFirstName] tied her scarf around my arm and I took to the lists to joust...
...unhorsing my opponent in the first pass!
...but was knocked off my horse.
Lady [From.GetFirstName] wanted to see the musicians and singers who came from afar to our tournament. I walked her to see them, and then I undertook to impress her by...
...composing a love ballad which met with general approval.
...dancing, but I stepped on her foot!
Lady [From.GetFirstName] wanted me to teach her archery, so we headed to the tournament range and I...
...showed her so well, she hit the bulls-eye
...couldn't hit the target myself.
I thought Lady [From.GetFirstName] fancied me and approached her alone, but she shooed me off laughing!
Obviously a case of female hysteria. Obviously.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] is truly fascinating, and has been nothing short of attentive and charming throughout the tournament.
We should see each other again.
I'll leave my bedroom door ajar...
Sir [From.GetFirstName] seemed charming, but he embarrassed himself when we were in public.
I'm never speaking to him again!
Maybe I should try and know him better before judging.
I'll still leave my bedroom door ajar...
Lady [From.GetFirstName] and I seemed to be getting on so well, when she told me she never wanted to see me again!
I've been dumped? ME?
[From.GetTitledFirstName] discretely led me to believe [From.GetSheHe]'d be waiting alone in [From.GetHerHis] bedroom tonight...
...and I'll go to [From.GetHerHim], of course!
...that's not going to happen.
...I'll show her how courtly love is better!
Lady [From.GetFirstName] suggested we continue our courtly romance after the tournament.
I'm already writing her a poem.
I don't think that's a good idea.
I'd rather stay friends.
Sir [From.GetFirstName] has rejected any suggestion of a romance between us, the cad!
I hate him!
As I'd expected, Sir [From.GetFirstName] discretely came to my room tonight while I was there alone.
*pant* *pant*
Sir [From.GetFirstName] has sworn he'll stay true to me, though leagues may separate us, people surround us...
This is love!
Sir [From.GetFirstName] is sorry, but he only wanted to be friends, he wasn't looking for love.
Friendship is good too.
You...you can't friend zone a woman!
All good things have an end, and the grand tournament is over. You got to see the jousts, the melee, the archery contest and mingle with all the lords and their ladies.
A jolly fun time was had by all.
Unfortunately, the tournament has been canceled
But I was having fun!
Since you have no living sons by [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName], her former titles have been returned to her upon your death and will instead pass to her heirs.
I suppose it is only right...
Since you have no living sons by [From.GetTitledFirstName], on his death your former titles have been returned to you.
I should hope so!

Since [From.GetTitledFirstName] has no living sons by [From.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName], on his death the titles that he had gained through the right of Jure Uxoris have now been returned to her and shall pass to her heirs instead.
Perhaps she will marry more carefully this time
Since you have no living sons by [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName], by right the titles that he once stripped from you have been returned and will fall instead to your heir rather than his.
Thank [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]!
Since you have no living sons by [From.GetTitledFirstName], the titles you once stripped from her by right of Jure Uxoris will instead fall to her heir rather than yours.
Since [From.GetTitledFirstName] has no living sons by [Spouse.GetTitledFirstName], the titles he stripped from her by right of Jure Uxoris fall to her heir rather than his.
It seems only fair, doesn't it?

The titles you stripped from [From.GetTitledFirstName] through the right of Jure Uxoris were yours only as part of her dowry. As a result of your divorce, those titles are thus legally returned to her.
Damnable woman!
As a result of the divorce between [From.GetTitledFirstName] and [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName], she now legally regains the titles stripped from her by right of Jure Uxoris.

My dear husband,
Perhaps you thought I would not notice if you handed my titles off to someone else? Considering your claim to them is by right of our marriage, with the express intention that it would pass to a child of our union, anything else means they return to me. They are part of my dowry after all, yes?

Signed,
[From.GetFirstName]

My overbearing husband, [From.GetFirstName], has been constantly interfering in the rulership of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName], and has of late grown beyond the merely opinionated. The garrison in [Root.Capital.GetName] has already begun to defer to his word before mine. Sadly, [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]'s laws support him, and he could usurp my rule if I am not careful. What shall I do? Who can I turn to?
I will turn to my lover
I will turn to my family
One of my faithful councillors can help me
Perhaps my good friend?
[From.GetFirstName] has enemies, does he not?
There is nothing I can do, and no-one to turn to...

My beloved [From.GetFirstName] informs me that her domineering husband, [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName], is attempting to usurp her rights in [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. She does not know what to do, and has turned to me for help.
I will go to her at once
I shall deal with the cur myself!
Alas, I cannot help her

Oh no! My hot-headed lover has decided to take matters into his own hands! He intends to ambush [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] and kill him, no matter who sees it or the damage to our reputation! Alas, it is too late to send him a message...all I can do is wait and hope for the best.
What if something happens to him?

You are out hunting with a few trusted companions, when - suddenly - the forest is filled with the lethal twanging of crossbows firing from hidden locations. You try to spur your horse to safety, but too late, a bolt slams into your ribcage and knocks you from the saddle. The last thing you see is [From.GetTitledFirstName] gazing down upon with grim satisfaction...

You are out hunting with a few trusted companions, when - suddenly - the forest is filled with the lethal twanging of crossbows firing from hidden locations. Thankfully you avoid harm, and when [From.GetTitledFirstName] rushes out at you with sword drawn, you match his blows. After a brief fight, you wound him and he is forced to flee. A close call indeed.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName]'s doing, no doubt...

You ambushed [From.GetTitledFirstName] while he was out riding with only a few trusted companions - all scythed down like wheat by hidden crossbowmen. You could not help but feel a grim satisfaction as you stood over the dying [From.GetFirstName] and watched him breathe his last, knowing he would never threaten your beloved [FromFromFrom.GetFirstName] again.
Serves him right!

It's over. [FromFrom.GetFirstName] ambushed and killed [From.GetTitledFirstName], just as he said he would. While the threat of usurpation is over, everyone knows what [FromFrom.GetFirstName] did...and they all believe that you were behind it.
Oh, you foolish, foolish man...

Everything did not go according to plan. [From.GetTitledFirstName] not only survived the ambush, he also bested you in a swordfight, injuring you in the process. You fled, cursing his name, and he set his men after you. Whatever happens, you will not tell him of [FromFromFrom.GetFirstName]'s involvement.

[FromFrom.GetFirstName] ambushed [From.GetTitledFirstName], just as he said he would, but it was no use. [FromFrom.GetFirstName] was wounded and fled, and now [From.GetTitledFirstName] has the sympathy of your vassals as well as a strong suspicion regarding who was behind it all. You are left with no recourse.

Your liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName], has approached you with an urgent problem: her boorish husband, [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has begun to enforce his will in her domain. Indeed, the right of Jure Uxoris means he may very well usurp her titles out from under her unless something is quickly done.
I shall go to her at once
She is on her own in this matter

My dear [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has sent me an urgent letter. It speaks of her boorish husband, [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName], and how he is enforcing his will in her domain. Indeed, unless something is quickly done, he may very well usurp her titles through the right of Jure Uxoris.
I will go to [From.Capital.GetName] with a large retinue to protect her
I will go to her personally
She is on her own in this matter

I received a letter from my friend, [From.GetTitledFirstName], with unfortunate news: her husband is preparing to usurp her domain, and the laws of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] appear to support him. She begs me for help, or all is lost.

Here's an interesting thing: [From.GetTitledName] has contacted me, saying that her husband is preparing to usurp her domain through the right of Jure Uxoris. Knowing of my long-standing rivalry with [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName], she begs for my intervention to stop him.
You receive the worst news. Your [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], writes to tell you that there is nothing [From.GetSheHe] can do to stop your husband. You are on your own.
I really thought [From.GetSheHe] might help...

Good news! Your [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], not only came to [Root.Capital.GetName], [From.GetSheHe] brought a number of soldiers and advisors to help you.
